title: Perfectos
author: Perfectos
content: Bitcoin price is currently 28k and I have 5k usd fund which I want to invest in crypto currency, and want to make this investment for long term, want to wait until next ATH or touch current ATH. Do you think it would be perfect to invest in Bitcoin now or should I wait for a few more days to get a good DIP? I am actually very weak in analysis so I would like to know from your personal analysis that Bitcoin can go below 20k again?

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: You never can tell if the price of Bitcoin will move in a downward trend or move in the upward trend, but since you're going for the long term investment then the current price shouldn't be an issue for you. No matter the price you buy as long as you are going to wait until Bitcoin returns back to its all time high then you shouldn't be concerned with the price of Bitcoin currently.

comments.author: Crypto Library
comments.body: For investment you take nice step to invest in bitcoin but It's seems that the candles have started dumping again. No one can say or prediction 100% confirmly that how will be the future condition of crypto market but if I have to say or suggest something to you -Since 5k usd is not a bad amount and from current analysis and from my own little experience, I want to say that wait some more time for investment, dump has started from 12 pm today, I think the price will decrease by 2-3k at present.  Then I will ask you to wait more to get a dip below 20k, may this pump could be a bulltrap.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: I think we haven't reached the top of this spike, there may be a dip every time but it will still be fine in the long run. I speculate that the price may not go below 20k anymore but probably close to $22k. Just my analysis.anyone can analyze the market but it's hard to really pinpoint a real price. What I can say is that you will get the highest return if you hold past the halving in 2024.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Perfectos on March 22, 2023, 06:45:46 PMBitcoin price is currently 28k and I have 5k usd fund which I want to invest in crypto currency, and want to make this investment for long term, want to wait until next ATH or touch current ATH. I am actually very weak in analysis so I would like to know from your personal analysis that Bitcoin can go below 20k again?It's on a dip now so from $28k, I've seen it drop today to $26k. The possibility of bitcoin going down to $20k is there but, it may not go back there anymore too. As usual with these predictions and scenarios, we can think of it. What's best is to just DCA on it, maybe on a weekly basis or every time you see the price of bitcoin go on a correction. Because we don't know how low it may get or how quickly it will go to the other high price levels that we're waiting for.Quote from: bittraffic on March 22, 2023, 07:58:44 PMWhat I can say is that you will get the highest return if you hold past the halving in 2024.And that's why for him, DCA is the best strategy to make.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: Perfectos on March 22, 2023, 06:45:46 PMDo you think it would be perfect to invest in Bitcoin now or should I wait for a few more days to get a good DIP? Ha, you're right! Looks like we got a dip alright, and not the delicious kind you'd find at a party. I guess this is why they say timing is everything when it comes to investing.As for whether it's the perfect time to invest in Bitcoin, that's always a tough call. It's hard to predict the future of any investment, especially one as volatile as cryptocurrency. But hey, if you're a believer in the long-term potential of Bitcoin and you're comfortable with the risk, now might be as good a time as any to buy in. Quote from: Perfectos on March 22, 2023, 06:45:46 PMI am actually very weak in analysis so I would like to know from your personal analysis that Bitcoin can go below 20k again?Of course, there's always the possibility that the market will dip even further in the coming days or weeks. But as they say, you can't time the market perfectly, and it's hard to say whether Bitcoin will dip below $20,000 again or continue to climb. Sometimes you just have to take the plunge and hope for the best.

comments.author: wajik-tempe
comments.body: long-term investment strategy in cryptocurrencies is often more fruitful than short-term trading. Investing in Bitcoin at the current price of 28k could be a good entry point for a long-term investment, considering its historical price trends and market growth potential. Therefore, it's important to invest only the amount you can afford to lose and diversify your investment portfolio

comments.author: NdaMk
comments.body: It is hard to predict maybe there could be another dip close to less than 20k again. As you wait for such and such time it will only limit your profit gain. So what you should do at this mixed market stage is to DCA and see how it goes. But if you feel you want to invest everything at once I will say u should be reluctant because even this 27k price tag is still low enough to gain considering the current ATH. Should we get another ATH then you could be having 2.5x+ of your investments.

comments.author: |MINER|
comments.body: Quote from: wajik-tempe on March 22, 2023, 09:18:01 PMlong-term investment strategy in cryptocurrencies is often more fruitful than short-term trading. Therefore, it's important to invest only the amount you can afford to lose and diversify your investment portfolioI am also agreeing with you in this point that now it is 27.3k is enough good dip for holding or investing on bitcoin because if you see the ath of it , it is still more than 2x . But seeking for more profit will not that bad idea for now cause I think bitcointalk can slip again from this current price because market is so unstable and I don't see any upper resistance for pump. So I think investment can be done by observing some more time .

I am actually very weak in analysis so I would like to know from your personal analysis that Bitcoin can go below 20k again?Just think about that there is no perfect time for investing in Bitcoin or any cryptocurrencies but it was good if you start when the price is low. Unfortunately, we're done with the dip, the market is now recovering, you never have to wait for the dip but instead, make a decision to buy now. If were you, I'll take the opportunity while the price of Bitcoin isn't surpassing $30k as any of these days it might be going there. Don't think about the past but rather think about the future as ATH will come next.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: This is a critical question every investors used to ask to maximize profits. The problem is that we don't know what the market is capable of doing since the Bitcoin price keep going up and down. We might think the price is going to come down more before buying and end up going higher. If we know the absolute answer to this very question then every investor in the market is going to be very profitable as well. You need to look at the market candle stick and try and analyse it so that you can predict the next possible direction of the price of Bitcoin.

There are lots of "what if" once you buy but what else can we do as no one knows what will happen in the future.

comments.body: Quote from: Perfectos on March 22, 2023, 06:45:46 PM(....)I am actually very weak in analysis so I would like to know from your personal analysis that Bitcoin can go below 20k again?No one knows what will happen to Bitcoin, especially these days. comments.body: Even if it does fall below 20k, it will give you profit sooner or later. Purchase, put it into non-custodial wallet and forget about it or as previously suggested do dca.

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Quote from: Perfectos on March 22, 2023, 06:45:46 PM~Best to just fuck it and do it right now. 5k is a lot of money though, I would suggest keeping a portion for now just in case things go downhill at the end unless those funds were intended purely for invest and you're entirely okay with it being a loss at the end.Expect the price to be like as it is or at least a bit higher in the fewer days and from that you might have already earned a few percentage for your returns so that's quite nice. Who knows might be the current stable price for such meantime but this is a highly volatile market that we should expect anything could happened instantly.  Without much experience or knowledge on trading, you should give an extra cautious when it comes to investing especially if that 5k is a hard earned money.

If I were you, try to make investment right at the moment but don't go all in, a little by little investment until it reach a point that you're satisfied.I think wait for a few more dip, this isn't a financial advice and don't take it as one but my speculation is we may touch $25k or $22k again. Moreover, don't be too hopeful for that, it may or may not touch that level and you still wouldn't get an entry.
